General.Name: Dcon Products Public Company Limited
General.Description: Dcon Products Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells construction supplies in Thailand. It operates through Sales of Construction Supplies; Sales of Real Estate; and Real Estate for Lease segments. The company provides pre-stressed planks and piles, corrugated planks, cowboy and concrete fences, blocks, hallow core, hexagon piles, and footing products under the DCON brand; and precast walls and floors, concrete posts, and other products. It is also involved in the sale of land and lease of real estate properties. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 3300/57 Elephant Building, Tower B, Bangkok, Thailand, 10900
